TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A person who has a license that gives them the legal power to witness the signing of documents, to certify that documents are real, and to take statements made under oath.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Persona que tiene una licencia que le da poder legal para atestiguar la firma de documentos, certificar que los documentos son auténticos y tomar declaraciones emitidas bajo juramento.
